variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use [SNP_Array=SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; WGS_SRA=Whole genome sequencing data available through SRA; WGS_SRA=Whole genome sequencing data available through SRA; WES_SRA=Whole exome sequencing data available through SRA]
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
Whole exome sequencing data available through SRA
Whole genome sequencing data available through SRA
